# close()

**Instance Method**

Closes the view, releasing the current preview item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func close()
```

## Discussion

Once a [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewView] is closed, it won’t accept any more preview items. You only need to call this method if [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewView/shouldCloseWithWindow] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. If you don’t close a [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewView] when you are done using it, your app will leak memory.

## Closing a Preview

- **shouldCloseWithWindow**: A Boolean value that determines whether the preview should close when its window closes.
